feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
